# Introduction
Health economic models are routinely develop to inform health policy decisions such as including (new) healthcare interventions in insurance packages or restricting their use to specific subgroups **[REF]**. Validating health economic models is an important step within the development of health economic models, as it contributes to increasing the credibility of health economic models **[REF CARO]**.\
